planttech2.update.available: A update for PlantTech 2 is available.
info.no_space: Not enough space in your inventory
info.any_enchanted_item: Any item with this enchantment. Level doesn`t matter
guide.planttech2.general_crossbreeding.t:
Crossbreeding is the key for renewable resources. But before starting there are a few important informations:

- PlantTech 2 crops act different then vanilla crops. They share some behaviors, but not all.
- The crops have traits that can be improved with crossbreeding. But the starting values are often causes behavior worse than vanilla behavior, but with better traitslevel they will beat the vanilla behaviour.
Example: Water source needs to be 1 block near on beginning, but at the end it is 9 blocks away.
These traits-effected behaviours are:
-- grow speed, starts with 90s per stage.
-- water source distance, starts with 1.
-- light level needed, starts with 14.
-- temperature tolerance, starts with 0.
- Each crop have a soil block that the crop needs to be planted on to grow.
- Each crop needs a specific temperature to grow.
- For getting the seeds/soil/temperature information, use the plant encyclopedia.
- To get the temperature of a biome, just use the thermometer in the biome.
- Bonemeal does not work on PlantTech 2 crops.
guide.planttech2.getting_started.text:
To start your career as a crossbreeder, you just need cropbars
(crafting: 4 sticks in 2x2 square) and a vanilla seed (or plantium nugget). Place the cropbars and rightclick with the seeds on the cropbars. And if the conditions are ok, than the crop will grow. If not, have a look at the next chapter.
guide.planttech2.crop_not_growing.text:
The easiest way to check, if the conditions are matched, is using the analyser. Just rightclick on the crop and you will get a message with every condition that is not matched.
The conditions are:

- Water source near enough
- Light level high enough
- Right soil
- Right temperature
guide.planttech2.multiply_crops_seeds.te:
There are two ways of multiply your crops/seeds without increase the traits:

1. Replant the crop again and again and get more seeds. Like when you try to get more carrots in vanilla. A higher fertility trait will help a lot.
2. When fully grown, crops will grow over nearby,empty cropbars. When the traits are known, the traits of the new crops will be known too.
guide.planttech2.how_to_crossbreed.text:
When trying to get better traits or new croptypes you need to crossbreed. The selection of the new traits/type is random with the following logic:

Type: It will be one of the parents type or, when the parentcrops have matching crossbreedingresult, with a small chance, a new type.

Traits: For each trait, the traits of the parents are compared.
If they are equal, with a small chance the trait will inceased by one.
Else, the traits of the new crop will be in range of the parents traits

The traits of the new crops are unknown and needs to be identified in the identifier.
guide.planttech2.autoreplanting.text:
All the crops in PlantTech 2 have a autoreplanting. Just rightclick the crops when fully grown and it is harvested and replanted again. It will calculates the drops and shrink the dropped seeds by one.
It is possible that this will result in no drops. Then you just got one seed, which was used to replant the crop.
guide.planttech2.croptraits.text:
**Growspeed**
- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Increase the growspeed of the crop.
- Seconds for increasing one stage = 90s - level * 6

**Sensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level 10
- Not used yet.

**Lightsensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 14
- Defines which lighlevel is needed to grow.
- Minimum needed lightlevel = 14 - level

**Watersensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 8
- Defines how near/far a water source needs to be that the crop can grow.
- It starts with one, but ends at 9
- Max distance for water source = 1 + level

**Temperaturetolerance**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 4
- Allows that the crop grow in more than the default temperature.
- Allowed temperature = default temperature +- level





**Productivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 5
- Increases the amount of products dropped

**Fertility**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 5
- Increased the amount of seeds dropped

**Spreedingspeed**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Not used yet


**Genestrenght**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Not used yet

**Energyvalue**

- Minimum level: 20
- Maximum level: 200
- Increase the amount of energy earned in the seedsqueezer when squeezing the seed (increases by 20 per level)
guide.planttech2.identify_traits.text:
The identifier is a machine that uses energy to identify the unknown traits of crops.
Just put the seeds with the unknown traits in the correct slot and the seeds will be identfied in a bit.
For more information, have a look at 'machines' -> 'identifier'.
guide.planttech2.fertilizer.text:
It is possible to speed up the crops with fertilizers, which almost acts like bonemeal.
PlantTech 2 fertilizers just works with a chance and only increase the stage by one.
To obtain the fertilizer, you put bonemeal in the infuser.
To increase the chance of the fertilizer, just put it in the infuser again.
guide.planttech2.genetic_engineering_cro:
To make the life a bit easier, it is possible to extract genes of crops and make seeds with these genes.
This process is a bridge between the way of crossbreeding and the way of planttechian.
You find more informations in the main category 'Genetic Engineering'
guide.planttech2.general_genetic_enginee: Genetic engineering is a way to create crops with selected traits. These traits need to be found first but could be used as much as you want. So, start crossbreed your crops and find traits you like to have.
guide.planttech2.extracting_genes.text:
Once you got traits you want to use, you need to extract the whole DNA sequence.
Therefore, put a seed with traits and an empty DNA container in the DNA extractor. You will obtain a DNA container with the whole DNA sequence; the seed will be destroyed in the process.
guide.planttech2.purifying_genes.text:
Mostly you don't want to use the whole DNA sequence. To remove single genes, put the DNA container in the DNA remover.
But you can't select which gene will be removed. Don't mess around when you only have a single container left.
On this way you can reduce the genes up to one.
guide.planttech2.combining_genes.text: DNA container can be combined in the DNA combiner. In this process the DNA sequences will be mixed, but the lower values will be dominant. Which type will be dominant is random. The used DNA container will not be consumed.
guide.planttech2.cleaning_containers.tex: Useless containers can be cleaned up to be reused. Therefore, put the container in the DNA cleaner.
Now the last step in getting personalized seeds is to put a DNA container and 500 biomass in the Seedconstructor.
Biomass Is a product in the seedsqueezer. The used DNA container will not be consumed.
All traits that are not set by the DNA container will be the default value. The default type is carrot and for the traits have a look at 'Crossbreeding' -> 'Croptraits'
guide.planttech2.test.text: XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX
guide.planttech2.general_machines.text:
Machines in Planttech 2 arn't just blocks that can be placed, they are complex symbiosises of metal and plants. Therefore the process of obtaining the machines is more complex as you are used to.
First of all the machines need a machineshell which is defined by the tier of the machine(more about that later). Lower tier machines need iron machineshells and higher tiers need plantium machineshells. To obtain the machineshell from a normal block, you need to place the normal block next to a carver crop and wait.
For the plant part you need the machinebulb of the wanted machine. To obtain these you need to get the machinebulb reprocessor and the seed squeezer as a bioenergy source. Only these bulbs are obtainable by crafting them.
When clicking on the right machinshell with a bulb the machine will start growing and once finish, the machine is ready. Not all machinebulbs are obtainable by default, only the tier 0 machines are obtainable by start. You need to get a knowledgechip and put it inside the knowledgechipslot in a machine to collect knowledge while the machine is running.
But you will only collect knowledge when then tier of the machine is higher or equal to the tier of the knowledgechip.
Once the knowledgechip reached higher tiers, it can be put in the machinebulb reprocessor to get better machinebulbs (they need energy and biomass)
guide.planttech2.chipalyzer.text: The chipalyzer takes items and blank chips to make them into chips that can be used to put into upgradeable items.
guide.planttech2.compressor.text: The compressor uses energy to convert crop particles into the belonging items.
guide.planttech2.dna_cleaner.text: The dna cleaner takes used dna containers and remove every dna sequenze left in it.
guide.planttech2.dna_combiner.text: The dna combiner combines two sequences of dna, but the lower value will always win. The used sample sequences will not be consumed
guide.planttech2.dna_extractor.text: The dna extractor consumes seeds and put the sequence of dna into a empty dna container.
guide.planttech2.dna_remover.text: The dna remover randomly removes single traits step by step. Should be used to reduce the sequence to only good traits.
guide.planttech2.energy_supplier.text: The energy supplier does what the names says, it supplies energy for blocks like electric fences.
guide.planttech2.identifier.text: The identifier is used to identify croptraits. It also can be used to convert vanilla seeds into pt2 seeds.
guide.planttech2.infuser.text: The infuser infuses biomass into things like bonemeal to obtain fertilizer.
guide.planttech2.machinebulb_reprocessor: Takes energy and biomass to produce machinebulbs, when the knowledgechip has the right tier.
guide.planttech2.mega_furnace.text: Is the same as a normal furnace, just with 6 slots.
guide.planttech2.void_plantfarm.text: You want to have cropproducts but don't want to have a farm consume your space? The void plantfarm takes a seed and will plant and farm the crops in the void dimension! It consumes energy to create a portal once it can harvest a crop and the production can be increased by putting a rangeupgrade in it! We can't access the dimension in person, but the machine can.
guide.planttech2.seedconstructor.text: The seedconstructor takes a sequence of dna, energy and biomass to creates seeds from it. The sequence will not be consumed. If a trait is not set in the sequence, it will be set to the default value.
guide.planttech2.seed_squeezer.text: The seed squeezer consumes seeds to produce energy and biomass.
guide.planttech2.solar_generator.text: The solar generator needs a solar focus to produce energy. The higher the tier of the focus, the higher the production.
slot.chipalyzer.iteminput: Insert item to implant in empty chip
slot.compressor.select: Select result after inserting particle in inputslot
slot.dnacleaner.input: Insert DNA container you want to clear
slot.dnacombiner.container: Insert DNA container with traits you want to combine
slot.dnaextractor.seeds: Insert seed you want to extract traits from
slot.dnaremover.container: Insert DNA container you want to remove a single train
slot.infuser.input: Insert item/block you want to infuse with biomass
slot.megafurnace.input: Insert item/block you want to smelt
slot.plantfarm.storage: Drops of harvested crops will be inserted here
slot.seedconstructor.container: Insert DNA container with traits you want to be constructed
slot.seedsqueezer.input: Insert planttech2 seeds that should be squeezed into biomass and energy
slot.seedsqueezer.squeeze: No input, will automaticly pull from input
slot.util.speedupgrade: Insert speedupgrade to speed up the process
slot.util.rangeupgrade: Insert rangeupgrade to increase the production
slot.util.energystorageupgrade: Insert storageupgrade to increase the energystorage
slot.util.knowledgechip: Insert knowledgechip to collect knowledge while machine is active (limited by the tier of the machine)
slot.util.fluidin: Insert biomass container to insert biomass
slot.util.fluidout: Insert biomass container to extract biomass
slot.util.energyin: Insert item with energy to insert energy
slot.util.energyout: Insert item with energy to extract energy
